com.syncron.ps.tools.fileMonitoring

Class FTPFileSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.syncron.ps.tools.fileMonitoring.FTPFileSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSender

    public class FTPFileSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSender
    An implementation of FileSender that uses FTP to transfer local files to a remote location.
    TODO: No 'retry' functionality implemented.
    TODO: No temp directory on the remote side implemented (is it necessary?)
    Author:
    micsie
